LanguageData.MassStoragePlatform.label: mass storage platform
LanguageData.MassStoragePlatform.description:
A device that can efficiently and quicky convert items between C3A1(physical) and C0A4(non-physical) form. It can store up to 2 billion non-quality, non-corpse items in itself. Only one type of item allowed. Power consumption: 100W idle, 200W 10 items, 400W 100 items, 800W 1000 items etc.
Eggs stored in internal storage are reset back to 0% and cannot grow in internal storage.
